com.example.atheneum.viewmodels.FirebaseRefUtils

Class BooksRefUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.atheneum.viewmodels.FirebaseRefUtils.RootRefUtils
      • com.example.atheneum.viewmodels.FirebaseRefUtils.BooksRefUtils

  • public class BooksRefUtils
extends RootRefUtils
    Class used to generate References to objects under the books node in the database.

    Used to prevent leaking database internal knowledge to the views (activities/fragments) if possible.
